args: --experiment_config={"dataloader": "EmnistDataLoader", "data_loader_args": {"splits": ["train", "val"], "sample_to_balance": true, "subsample_fraction": null, "transform": null, "target_transform": null, "batch_size": 256, "shuffle": true, "num_workers": 8, "cuda": true, "seed": 4711}, "model": "CharacterModel", "metrics": ["accuracy"], "network": "LeNet", "network_args": {"input_size": [28, 28], "output_size": 62}, "train_args": {"batch_size": 256, "epochs": 2}, "criterion": "CrossEntropyLoss", "criterion_args": {"weight": null, "ignore_index": -100, "reduction": "mean"}, "optimizer": "AdamW", "optimizer_args": {"lr": 0.01, "betas": [0.9, 0.999], "eps": 1e-08, "weight_decay": 0, "amsgrad": false}, "lr_scheduler": "OneCycleLR", "lr_scheduler_args": {"max_lr": 0.001, "epochs": 2}, "callbacks": ["Checkpoint", "EarlyStopping", "WandbCallback"], "callback_args": {"Checkpoint": {"monitor": "val_accuracy"}, "EarlyStopping": {"monitor": "val_loss", "min_delta": 0.0, "patience": 3, "mode": "min"}, "WandbCallback": {"log_batch_frequency": 1}, "WandbImageLogger": {"num_examples": 4}}, "verbosity": 2, "resume_experiment": null, "experiment_group": "Sample Experiments"}
